extendedInfo.description: Christian prayers to pray to Lord morning, evening and every time. Prayers help you to connect to God and gain strength to face the challenges of life.In the event of failure in career, business and relationship, it is JESUS who gives us strength and face everything like a hill faces strong winds.Use this christian prayers app to pray for yourself, your dear ones and for everyone in your country and world.Always remember the following quote related to prayers:If the only prayer you ever say in your entire life is thank you, it will be enough. - Meister EckhartMay God bless all.Keep these prayers handy and you would release yourself from lot of stress.Prayers are the best way to connect with the Lord. Pray to Jesus and we shall be listened to. Features:Browse prayers easily with the help of intuitive UI.option to send question/answer to email/dropbox/sms etc.If  you have any suggestion/complaint for this application, do let us know at http://www.javexperience.com/contact-us

reviews.title: oh god perfect
reviews.comment: if you can update translation likes langangue indonesian. it\'s very helfuly we us the people.
reviews.author: Meriyati Xu

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This app is Awesome, must try this..!
reviews.author: Asheda Mahraomai

reviews.title: Too many ads
reviews.comment: Nice concept but the ads and the redirect to play store for games is distracting and annoying. Redirect also causes crash. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Renee Johnson

reviews.title: Christian prayer
reviews.comment: I love the prayers, bless the Lord o my soul.

reviews.title: It\'s ok
reviews.comment: This app would be a lot better if it didn\'t have the ads flashing on top and bottom. How am I suppose to be able to concentrate on connecting with God, when there are advertisements flashing at me?
reviews.author: Fara Reid
